author: schmendrick
title: This shark, swallow you whole
review:
When my 2 year old son got this set, the first thing was putting a figure into the shark's mouth. The first thing visitors of us do, when they see the shark: Putting a figure into the shark's mouth. 

This Duplo shark is still the absolute toy-star in our house. Wherever my son goes, the shark follows. By the way: the shark went into the sandbox - and survived. It fell down the balcony - and survived. Lego did a great job with the design and construction of this... beast.

Bright side of the moon:
+ Amazing shark (28 cm length) with rubber fins and teeth
+ Paint job of the shark
+ The sound when snapping the jaws
+ Five 2x8 plates (rare to get - in my opinion)

Dark side of the moon:
- The jaw-snapping-action-brick could have been placed more discreetly or / and in shark-color
